results.title: Cellular senescence and disrupted proteostasis induced by myotube atrophy are prevented with low-dose metformin and leucine cocktail
results.text_hl: Cellular senescence and disrupted proteostasis induced by @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@myotube atrophy@@@ are prevented with low-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@leucine@@@ cocktail

citations.NLM: Petrocelli JJ, de Hart NMMP, Lang MJ, Yee EM, Ferrara PJ, Fix DK, Chaix A, Funai K, Drummond MJ. Cellular senescence and disrupted proteostasis induced by myotube atrophy are prevented with low-dose metformin and leucine cocktail Aging (Albany NY). 2023 Mar 20;15(6):1808-1832. PMID: 36947713

results.title: Exposure to High Altitude Promotes Loss of Muscle Mass That Is Not Rescued by Metformin.
results.text_hl: Few therapeutic interventions attenuate @DISEASE_Muscular_Atrophy @DISEASE_MESH:D009133 @@@muscle atrophy@@@; however, the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ drug, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@), has been suggested as a potential therapeutic to preserve muscle mass with aging and @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@atrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Fullerton ZS, McNair BD, Marcello NA, Schmitt EE, Bruns DR. Exposure to High Altitude Promotes Loss of Muscle Mass That Is Not Rescued by Metformin. High Alt Med Biol. 2022 Sep;23(3):215-222. PMID: 35653735

results.title: The role of ZEB1 in mediating the protective effects of metformin on skeletal muscle atrophy.
results.text_hl: Compared with the normal cell differentiation group, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated group presented increased myotube diameters and reduced expression levels of @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@atrophy@@@-marker proteins.

citations.NLM: Jia P, Che J, Xie X, Han Q, Ma Y, Guo Y, Zheng Y. The role of ZEB1 in mediating the protective effects of metformin on skeletal muscle atrophy. J Pharmacol Sci. 2024 Oct;156(2):57-68. PMID: 39179335
citations.BibTeX: @article{39179335, title={The role of ZEB1 in mediating the protective effects of metformin on skeletal muscle atrophy.}, author={Jia P and Che J and Xie X and Han Q and Ma Y and Guo Y and Zheng Y}, journal={J Pharmacol Sci}, volume={156}, number={2}, pages={57-68}}

results.title: Metformin ameliorates thymus degeneration of mice by regulating mitochondrial function.
results.text_hl: Histological examination showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration could alleviate @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@thymus atrophy@@@ caused by @CHEMICAL_Galactose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005690 @@@D-galactose@@@.

citations.NLM: Yang SP, Su Q, Zhang YR, Sun Y, Chai YR. Metformin ameliorates thymus degeneration of mice by regulating mitochondrial function. Int Immunopharmacol. 2022 Jul;108():108744. PMID: 35395467

results.title: Metformin inhibits muscle atrophy through the PI3K/AKT/mTOR pathway in a rat model of acute rotator cuff tears.
results.text_hl: The morphology of the SS, whose @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@atrophy@@@ was prevented by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, had fewer wide pores and less reduced muscle fiber area than those of the control group.

citations.NLM: Yoon JP, Park SJ, Kim DH, Choi YS, Lee HJ, Chung SW. Metformin inhibits muscle atrophy through the PI3K/AKT/mTOR pathway in a rat model of acute rotator cuff tears. J Shoulder Elbow Surg. 2024 Dec 26;():. PMID: 39732387

results.title: Metformin use and brain atrophy in nondemented elderly individuals with diabetes.
results.text_hl: Comparing the groups show strong enough results regarding the lower @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@atrophy@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users.

citations.NLM: Nabizadeh F, Kankam SB, Balabandian M, Hashemi SM, Sharifkazemi H, Rostami MR, Alzheimer's disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI). Metformin use and brain atrophy in nondemented elderly individuals with diabetes. Exp Gerontol. 2022 Sep;166():111890. PMID: 35843348

results.title: Metformin and leucine increase satellite cells and collagen remodeling during disuse and recovery in aged muscle.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to determine if a dual treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@leucine@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@LEU@@@) would prevent @DISEASE_Muscular_Disorders_Atrophic @DISEASE_MESH:D020966 @@@disuse@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@atrophy@@@ and/or promote @DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ recovery in aged @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and if these @DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ responses correspond to changes in satellite cells and collagen remodeling.

citations.NLM: Petrocelli JJ, Mahmassani ZS, Fix DK, Montgomery JA, Reidy PT, McKenzie AI, de Hart NM, Ferrara PJ, Kelley JJ, Eshima H, Funai K, Drummond MJ. results.title: Helicobacter pylori-mediated gastric pathogenesis is attenuated by treatment of 2-deoxyglucose and metformin.
results.text_hl: As a result, indicators of gastric pathogenesis by @DISEASE_Helicobacter_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D016481 @@@H. pylori infection@@@ including infiltration of polymorphonuclear neutrophils and lymphocytes, intestinal @DISEASE_Metaplasia @DISEASE_MESH:D008679 @@@metaplasia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@atrophy@@@, and proliferation of gastric epithelial cells were attenuated by short-term administration of @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2DG@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@, or Combi.

citations.NLM: Su H, Bak EJ, Kim A, Tissera K, Cha JH, Jang S. Helicobacter pylori-mediated gastric pathogenesis is attenuated by treatment of 2-deoxyglucose and metformin. J Microbiol. 2022 Aug;60(8):849-858. PMID: 35731346

results.title: Honey and metformin ameliorated diabetes-induced damages in testes of rat; correlation with hormonal changes
results.text_hl: The animals in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and honey-treated group exhibited with improved tubules @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@atrophy@@@, elevated spermiogenesis index and germinal epithelium thickness.

citations.NLM: Nasrolahi O, Khaneshi F, Rahmani F, Razi M. Honey and metformin ameliorated diabetes-induced damages in testes of rat; correlation with hormonal changes Iran J Reprod Med. 2013 Dec;11(12):1013-20. PMID: 24639728

results.title: Metformin promotes tau aggregation and exacerbates abnormal behavior in a mouse model of tauopathy
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exacerbates @<m>DISEASE_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001284 @@@hindlimb atrophy@@@, increases @VARIANT_p.P301S_MAPT_human @VARIANT_tmVar:p|SUB|P|301|S;HGVS:p.P301S;VariantGroup:1;CorrespondingGene:4137;RS#:63751438;CorrespondingSpecies:9606;CA#:225439 @@@P301S@@@ hyperactive behavior, induces @GENE_MAPT @GENE_4137 @@@tau@@@ cleavage by @GENE_CASP3 @GENE_12367 @@@caspase 3@@@ and disrupts synaptic structures.

citations.NLM: Barini E, Antico O, Zhao Y, Asta F, Tucci V, Catelani T, Marotta R, Xu H, Gasparini L. Metformin promotes tau aggregation and exacerbates abnormal behavior in a mouse model of tauopathy Mol Neurodegener. 2016 Feb 9;11():16. PMID: 26858121
